text:
Hi all,
Thanks in advance,

I am working on CRM extension development for deals record.  See attached, I want to show calendar (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/@fullcalendar/react>) if possible or whatever other calendar.

Help to achieve this will be greatly appreciated.

Looking forward to hearing from you guys.
I'm available to help with CRM UI extensions as a freelancer

<@U05R380MLMC> Thanks for replying

Are you 100% sure that you can show calendar at desired section?

That's a good question.

You will be limited to which components you can use as you have to use only the HubSpot provided components.

That being said, I would probably use the iframe example.

I don't know your entire use case but I would make every effort to get you your desired end result.
What calendar are you displaying?  What functionality is required when viewing the calendar?
<@U05R380MLMC> I already developed the i-frame solution. Was concerned for built in view if possible.
Thanks for taking time to reply my message.
Yw!  Share screenshots of what you built if you are open to it.
